label: Cena 01 — Paisagem ao amanhecer
prompt: A breathtaking mountain landscape at dawn, mist rolling through valleys, first rays of sunlight painting the peaks in gold and pink, timelapse-style movement, cinematic wide shot.

label: Cena 02 — Extensão da paisagem
prompt: The sun rises fully above the mountain range, birds fly across the frame, the mist slowly dissipates revealing a lush green valley below.

label: Cena 03 — Personagem aparece no horizonte
prompt: A lone hiker silhouetted against the sunrise sky, walking on a mountain ridge trail, dramatic backlit composition, epic cinematic feel.

label: Cena 04 — Transição: zoom no rosto do personagem
prompt: [ZOOM_IN_CUT] Close-up of the hiker's determined face, sweat on their brow, eyes focused on the summit ahead, natural lighting.

label: Cena 05 — Acampamento: personagem descansa
prompt: The hiker sets up camp on a flat rocky ledge, unpacking a tent, warm late-afternoon light, mountains in the background, peaceful atmosphere.

label: Cena 06 — Extensão: fogueira à noite
prompt: A campfire crackling under a stunning starry night sky, the hiker sits beside the fire, embers floating upward, Milky Way visible overhead.

label: Cena 07 — Transição: panorâmica para o vale
prompt: [PAN_RIGHT_CUT] The camera pans from the campfire to reveal a vast illuminated valley town far below, twinkling lights in the darkness.

label: Cena 08 — Cume: chegada ao topo
prompt: The triumphant hiker reaches the mountain summit, arms raised in victory, 360-degree panoramic view of mountains and clouds below, golden hour, emotional moment.

label: Cena 09 — Extensão: contemplação no cume
prompt: The hiker sits on the summit boulder, gazing at the horizon as clouds drift by below, serene and reflective, wind gently moving their hair.

label: Cena 10 — Encerramento: narração do personagem
prompt: A hiker speaking to camera with the mountain summit visible behind them, warm smile, reflective tone, natural wind sound.
